Reviews.Content: Good place It's a hotel run by a family. The hotel can be described as a low-cost, or budget place to stay. It is located somewhat remotely, but there are buses nearby that can take you cheaply to the centre and other places of interest within 10-15 minutes, and the area is peaceful and quite (no crowds of tourists). The room was clean and tidy. It is cleaned every day. We did not like the absence of a fridge in the room. Otherwise recommended if you value your money. (Getting a place in the centre is in my opinion not worth it. The prices are ridiculously high and the service is not good).
Reviews.Author: samppa
